intro: Combretum hereroense var. villosissimum, commonly known as the Herero combretum, is a deciduous shrub native to southern Africa. The plant typically grows in dry, rocky habitats and is adapted to arid conditions. Its bark is thick and often fissured, providing structural support in its harsh environment.
